A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ completely feels like a movie that takes place in space but nothing related to the SW franchise. The movie has amazing CGI\, its a truly beautiful movie.....BUT.....thats about it. Everything else sucks from beginning to end. Luke was supposed to be the strongest Jedi in existence\, and yet all we get is a bitter old man that is afraid of himself. Finn is useless in this movie\, no purpose whatsoever. Rey and her high school crush with Kylo (put a shirt on) made me want to pull my eyes out. Rename the movie to something other than Star Wars\, because it had nothing to do with the franchise.
